mapper.select: select n.idn_nomination_concept as key, n.concept_code as value from tpa_tnomination_concept n, tpa_tnom_concept_system c where n.idn_nom_concept_type not in (select t.idn_nom_concept_type from tpa_tnom_concept_type t where t.type_code in ('COMMERCIAL', 'ALLOCATION_ONLY')) and c.idn_nomination_concept = n.idn_nomination_concept and n.is_enabled = 'Y' and c.idn_pipeline_system = #{idn_system} order by 2
select n.idn_nom_concept_type as key, n.type_desc as value from tpa_tnom_concept_type n where n.type_code not in ('COMMERCIAL', 'ALLOCATION_ONLY') order by 2
select idn_unit_type as key, type_desc as value from tpa_tunit_type
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT p.point_code FROM tpa_tsystem_point p WHERE p.point_code = #{nomConcept} UNION SELECT c.concept_code FROM tpa_tnomination_concept c WHERE c.concept_code = #{nomConcept})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tpa_tnom_concept_system(idn_nom_concept_system, idn_nomination_concept, idn_pipeline_system, start_date, end_date, aud_ins_date, aud_last_date, aud_ins_user, aud_last_user) VALUES(tpa_snom_concept_system.nextval, (SELECT idn_nomination_concept FROM tpa_tnomination_concept WHERE concept_code = #{nomConcept}), #{idn_system}, TRUNC(SYSDATE-1), NULL, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{user}, #{user})

INSERT INTO tpa_tnomination_concept (idn_nomination_concept, concept_code, concept_desc, idn_nom_concept_type, idn_unit_type, sort_value, is_point_concept, is_area_concept, is_zone_concept, is_enabled, is_calculated, allow_negative, aud_ins_date, aud_last_date, aud_ins_user, aud_last_user) VALUES (#{idn_nomination_concept, #{nomConcept}, #{nomConcept}, #{unitType}, #{unitType}, 999999, 'N', #{is_area_concept}, #{is_zone_concept}, 'Y', 'N', 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{user}, #{user}))
